title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Simulation Workshop for Women’s and Children’s Health Education in Low-Income Countries

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can identify and explain at least three major health issues affecting women and children in low-income countries
Participants develop response strategies for two crisis scenarios that may occur in maternal and child health settings through VR simulations

Participants, working in groups of four, can analyze health education needs in low-income countries (e.g., African regions), select five core topics, develop a project proposal (within 10 pages) reflecting these topics, and deliver a 10-minute presentation with a 5-minute Q&A session.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
